   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26:          binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1, logging_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   31:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl/1,
   33:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   34:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   35:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   36:          io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_until_stdin_list_mode/1,
   37:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   38:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   39:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   40:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1,
   41:          invalid_req/1
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: 
   45: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   46: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   47: %% For spawn
   48: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   49: 
   50: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   51: 
   52: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   53: 
   54: -export([get_until_eof/2]).
   55: 
   56: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   57: 
   58: %%-define(debug, true).
   59: 
   60: -ifdef(debug).
   61: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   62: -else.
   63: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   64: -endif.
   65: 
   66: suite() ->
   67:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   68:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   69: 
   70: all() -> 
   71:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   72:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl, logging_gl,
   73:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   74:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   75:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   76:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   77:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   78:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   79:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   80:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   81:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   82:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   83:      io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode,
   84:      io_get_until_stdin_list_mode,
   85:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   86:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   87:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   88:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode,
   89:      invalid_req
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: groups() -> 
   93:     [].
   94: 
   95: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   96:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   97:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   98:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   99:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
  100: 
  101: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  102:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  103:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  104:     ok.
  105: 
  106: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  107:     Config.
  108: 
  109: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  110:     Config.
  111: 
  112: -record(state, {
  113:                 q = [],
  114:                 nxt = eof,
  115:                 mode = list
  116:                }).
  117: 
  118: uprompt(_L) ->
  119:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  120: 
  121: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  122: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  124:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  125: 	new ->
  126: 	    rtnode:run(
  127:               [{putline,""},
  128:                {putline, "2."},
  129:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  130:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  131:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  132:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  133:                {putline, "hej"},
  134:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  135:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  136:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  137:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  138:                {putline, "hej"},
  139:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  140:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  141:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  142:         _ ->
  143:             ok
  144:     end,
  145:     %% And one with oldshell
  146:     rtnode:run(
  147:       [{putline,""},
  148:        {putline, "2."},
  149:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  150:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  151:        {expect, "default"},
  152:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  153:        {putline, "hej"},
  154:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  155:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  156:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  157:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  158:        {putline, "hej"},
  159:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  160:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  161:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  162:     ok.
  163: 
  164: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  165: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  167:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  168: 	new ->
  169: 	    rtnode:run(
  170:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  171:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  172:               ],[],"",[]),
  173:       	    rtnode:run(
  174:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  175:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  176:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  177:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  178:       	    rtnode:run(
  179:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  180:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  181:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  182:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  183:                        "-pa",PA]);
  184:         _ ->
  185:             ok
  186:     end.
  187: 
  188: slogan() ->
  189:     "Test slogan".
  190: session_slogan() ->
  191:     "Test session slogan".
  192: 
  193: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  194: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  195:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  196: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  197:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  198:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  199:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  200:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  201:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  202:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  203:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  204:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  205:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  206:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  207:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  208:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  209:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  210:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  211:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  212:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  213:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  214:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  215:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  216:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  217:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  218:     file:close(WFile),
  219:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  220:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  221:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  222:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  223:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  224:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  225:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  226:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  227:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  228: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  229:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  230:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  231:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  232: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  233:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  234:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  235:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  236: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  237:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  238:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  239:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  240: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  241:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  242:     file:position(RFile,0),
  243:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  244:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  245:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  246:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  247:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  248:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  249:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  250:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  251:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  252: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  253:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  254:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  255:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  256: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  257:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  258:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  259:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  260: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  261:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  262:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  263:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  264: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  265:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  266:     file:close(RFile),
  267:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  268: 	new ->
  269: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  270: 	    rtnode:run(
  271:               [{putline,""},
  272:                {putline, "2."},
  273:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  274:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  275:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  276:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  277:                {putline, "hej"},
  278:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  279:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  280:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  281:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  282:                {putline, "hej"},
  283:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  284:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  285:                {expect, "true"},
  286:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  287:                {expect, "true"},
  288:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  289:                {expect, "true"},
  290:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  291:                {expect, "true"}
  292:               ],[]);
  293:         _ ->
  294:             ok
  295:     end,
  296:     %% And one with oldshell
  297:     rtnode:run(
  298:       [{putline,""},
  299:        {putline, "2."},
  300:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  301:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  302:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  303:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  304:        {putline, "hej"},
  305:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  306:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  307:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  308:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  309:        {putline, "hej"},
  310:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  311:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  312:        {expect, "true"},
  313:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  314:        {expect, "true"},
  315:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  316:        {expect, "true"},
  317:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  318:        {expect, "true"}
  319:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  320: 
  321:     %% Test that terminal options when used in non-terminal are returned as they should
  322:     %% both when run as an os:cmd and when run directly as a port.
  323:     Erl = ct:get_progname(),
  324:     CmdStr = os:cmd(Erl ++ " -noshell -eval \"io:format(~s'~p.',[io:getopts()])\" -s init stop"),
  325:     maybe
  326:         {ok, T, _} ?= erl_scan:string(CmdStr),
  327:         {ok, Opts} ?= erl_parse:parse_term(T),
  328:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(terminal,Opts)),
  329:         case os:type() of
  330:             {win32, nt} ->
  331:                 %% On Windows stdin will be a tty
  332:                 ?assertEqual(true, proplists:get_value(stdin,Opts));
  333:             _ ->
  334:                 ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdin,Opts))
  335:         end,
  336:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdout,Opts)),
  337:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stderr,Opts))
  338:     else
  339:         _ -> ct:fail({failed_to_parse, CmdStr})
  340:     end,
  341: 
  342:     Port = erlang:open_port({spawn, Erl ++ " -noshell -eval \"io:format(~s'~p.',[io:getopts()])\" -s init stop"},
  343:             [exit_status]),
  344:     PortStr = (fun F() ->
  345:         receive
  346:             {Port,{data,D}} -> D ++ F();
  347:             {Port,{exit_status,0}} -> []
  348:         end
  349:     end)(),
  350: 
  351:     maybe
  352:         {ok, PortT, _} ?= erl_scan:string(PortStr),
  353:         {ok, PortOpts} ?= erl_parse:parse_term(PortT),
  354:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(terminal,PortOpts)),
  355:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdin,PortOpts)),
  356:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdout,PortOpts)),
  357:         ?assertEqual(proplists:get_value(stderr, io:getopts()), proplists:get_value(stderr,PortOpts))
  358:     else
  359:         _ -> ct:fail({failed_to_parse, PortStr})
  360:     end,
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  364: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  365:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  366: 
  367:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  368:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  369:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  370:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  371:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  372:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  373: 
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  377: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  378:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  379: 
  380:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  381:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  382:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  383:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  384:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  385:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  386: 
  387:     ok.
  388: 
  389: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  390: %% correct error when in binary mode
  391: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  392:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  393: 
  394:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  395:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  396:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  397:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  398: 
  399:     ok.
  400: 
  401: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  402: %% correct error when in list mode
  403: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  404:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  405: 
  406:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  407:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  408:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  409:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  410: 
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when \r is sent without \n
  414: file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl(_Config) ->
  415:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, []),
  416: 
  417:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc\r"),
  418:     {error,timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 2000),
  419:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def\r\n"),
  420:     {ok, ~S'got: <<"abc\rdef\r\n">>\n'} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  421:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  422:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  423: 
  424:     ok.
  425: 
  426: 
  427: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  428: %% correct error when in binary mode
  429: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  430:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [binary]),
  431: 
  432:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  433:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  434:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  435:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  436: 
  437:     ok.
  438: 
  439: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  440: %% correct error when in list mode
  441: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  442:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [list]),
  443: 
  444:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  445:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  446:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  447:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  448: 
  449:     ok.
  450: 
  451: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in binary mode
  452: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  453:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  454:                          fun() ->
  455:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  456:                                      eof -> eof;
  457:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  458:                                  end
  459:                          end, [binary]),
  460: 
  461:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  462:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  463:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  464:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  465:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  466: 
  467:     ok.
  468: 
  469: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in binary mode
  470: io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  471: 
  472:     GetUntilEof =
  473:         fun() ->
  474:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  475:                 IoServer !
  476:                     {io_request,
  477:                      self(),
  478:                      IoServer,
  479:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  480:                 receive
  481:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  482:                         {ok, Data}
  483:                 end
  484:         end,
  485: 
  486:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  487: 
  488:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  489:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  490:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  491:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  492: 
  493:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  494: 
  495:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  496:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  497:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  498: 
  499:     ok.
  500: 
  501: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in list mode
  502: io_get_until_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  503: 
  504:     GetUntilEof =
  505:         fun() ->
  506:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  507:                 IoServer !
  508:                     {io_request,
  509:                      self(),
  510:                      IoServer,
  511:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  512:                 receive
  513:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  514:                         {ok, Data}
  515:                 end
  516:         end,
  517: 
  518:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  519: 
  520:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  521:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  522:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  523:     {ok, "got: \"x\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  524: 
  525:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  526: 
  527:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  528:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  529:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  530: 
  531:     ok.
  532: 
  533: get_until_eof([],eof) -> {done,eof,[]};
  534: get_until_eof(ThisFar,eof) -> {done,ThisFar,eof};
  535: get_until_eof(ThisFar,CharList) -> {more,ThisFar++CharList}.
  536: 
  537: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in list mode
  538: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  539:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  540:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  541:                                       eof -> eof;
  542:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  543:                                   end
  544:                          end, [list]),
  545: 
  546:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  547:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  548:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  549:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  550:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  551: 
  552:     ok.
  553: 
  554: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  555: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  556:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  557:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  558:                                       eof -> eof;
  559:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  560:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  561:                                               eof -> Chars;
  562:                                               Line ->
  563:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  564:                                           end
  565:                                   end
  566:                          end, [binary]),
  567: 
  568:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  569:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  570:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  571:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  572: 
  573:     ok.
  574: 
  575: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  576: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  577:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  578:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  579:                          [binary],
  580:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  581: 
  582:     %% Invalid utf8
  583:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  584: 
  585:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  586:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  587:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  588:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  589:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  590: 
  591:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  592:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  593:                          [binary],
  594:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  595: 
  596:     %% Valid utf8
  597:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  598: 
  599:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  600:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  601:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  602:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  603:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  604: 
  605:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  606:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  607:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  608:                          [binary],
  609:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  610: 
  611:     %% Invalid utf8
  612:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  613: 
  614:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  615:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  616:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  617:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  618:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  619: 
  620:     ok.
  621: 
  622: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  623: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  624:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  625:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  626:                          [list],
  627:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  628: 
  629:     %% Invalid utf8
  630:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  631: 
  632:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  633:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  634:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  635:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  636:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  637: 
  638:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  639:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  640:                          [list],
  641:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  642: 
  643:     %% Valid utf8
  644:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  645: 
  646:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  647:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  648:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),

  650:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),

  653: 
  654: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  655: %% but unicode is printed out
  656: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  657:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  658:         start_stdin_node(
  659:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  660:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  661:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  662:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  663:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  664:                            %% unicode string.
  665:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  666:                            {ok, Chars};
  667:                        Else ->
  668:                            Else
  669:                    end
  670:           end,
  671:           [list],
  672:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  673: 
  674:     %% Valid utf8
  675:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  676: 
  677:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  678:     receive
  679:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  680:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  681:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  682:     end,
  683: 
  684:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  685:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  686: 
  687:     ok.
  688: 
  689: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  690:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  691: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  692:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  693:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  694:     Cmd = lists:append(
  695:             [ct:get_progname(),
  696:              " -noshell ",
  697:              ExtraArgs,
  698:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  699:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  700:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  701:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout,
  702:                                        {env, [{"LC_CTYPE","en_US.UTF-8"}]}]),
  703:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  704:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  705:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  706:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  707: 
  708: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  709:     try
  710:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  711:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  712:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  713:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  714:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  715:         spawn(fun() ->
  716:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  717:                       init:stop("crash")
  718:               end),
  719:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  720:     catch E:R:ST ->
  721:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  722:     end.
  723: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  724:     case ReadFun() of
  725:         eof ->
  726:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  727:             init:stop();
  728:         {ok, Char} ->
  729:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  730:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  731:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  732:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  733:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  734:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  735:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  736:         {error, Reason} ->
  737:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  738:                               io_lib:format("error: ~p\n",[Reason]))),
  739:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  740:     end.
  741: 
  742: get_lc_ctype() ->
  743:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  744: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  745: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  746: 	_ ->
  747: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  748:     end.
  749: 
  750: %% Test various unicode options.
  751: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  752:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  753:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  754:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  755:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  756:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  757: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  758: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  759: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  760: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  761:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  762:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  763: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  764: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  765: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  766: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  767: 
  768:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  769:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  770:     %% larger than 127).
  771:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  772:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  773: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  774: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  775: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  776: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  777:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  778: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  779: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  780: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  781: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  782: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  783: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  784:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  785: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  786: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  787:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  788: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  789: 					     [read,binary]),
  790: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  791: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  792: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  793: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  794: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  795: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  796: 			  file:close(F),
  797: 			  R
  798: 		  end,
  799:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  800: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  801: 						 [read,binary,
  802: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  803: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  804: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  805: 			      file:close(F),
  806: 			      R
  807: 		      end,
  808:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  809: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  810: 						     [read,
  811: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  812: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  813: 				  file:close(F),
  814: 				  R
  815: 			  end,
  816:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  817: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  818: 							 [read,
  819: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  820: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  821: 				      file:close(F),
  822: 				      R
  823: 			      end,
  824:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  825:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  826:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  827:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  828:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  829: 
  830:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  831:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  832:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  833:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  834: 
  835:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  836: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  837: 					      [write,binary]),
  838: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  839: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  840: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  841: 			   file:close(F),
  842: 			   ok
  843: 		   end,
  844:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  845:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  846:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  847: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  848: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  849: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  850: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  851: 			       file:close(F),
  852: 			       ok
  853: 		       end,
  854:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  855:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  856:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  857:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  858: 
  859:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  860: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  861: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  862: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  863: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  864: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  865: 					utf8 ->
  866: 					    unicode;
  867: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  868: 					    Tpl;
  869: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  870: 					    {Atom, big}
  871: 				    end,
  872: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  873: 				 file:read(F,10),
  874: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  875: 			     ok
  876: 		     end,
  877:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  878:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  879:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  880: 
  881:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  882:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  883:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  884:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  885: 
  886: 
  887:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  888:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  889: 
  890:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  891: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  892: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  893: 					 [write,binary]),
  894: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  895: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  896: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  897: 			      ok
  898: 		      end,
  899:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  900: 
  901:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  902: 	new ->
  903: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  904: 	    rtnode:run(
  905:               [{putline,""},
  906:                {putline, "2."},
  907:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  908:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  909:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  910:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  911:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  912:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  913:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  914:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  915:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  916:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  917:         _ ->
  918:             ok
  919:     end,
  920:     rtnode:run(
  921:       [{putline,""},
  922:        {putline, "2."},
  923:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  924:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  925:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  926:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  927:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  928:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  929:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  930:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  931:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  932:       ],[],"",
  933:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  934:     ok.
  935: 
  936: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  937: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  938:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  939:     rand:seed(default),
  940:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  941:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  942:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  943: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  944:     FSize = 9*1024,
  945:     NumItersRead = 2,
  946:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  947:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  948:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  949: 
  950:     DoOneFile1 =
  951: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  952: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  953: 		ct:log("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  954: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  955: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  956: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  957: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  958: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  959: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  960: 
  961: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  962: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  963: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  964: 				       Read1),
  965: 
  966: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  967: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  968: 				       [read,binary,
  969: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  970: 				       Read2),
  971: 
  972: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  973: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  974: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  975: 				    Other -> Other end
  976: 			end,
  977: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  978: 				       [read,binary,
  979: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  980: 				       Read3),
  981: 
  982: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  983: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  984: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  985: 				    Other -> Other end
  986: 			end,
  987: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  988: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  989: 				       Read4),
  990: 
  991: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  992: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  993: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  994: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  995: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  996: 
  997: 		file:delete(Fname)
  998: 	end,
  999:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
 1000: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
 1001: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
 1002: 
 1003:     DoOneFile2 =
 1004: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
 1005: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
 1006: 		ct:log("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
 1007: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
 1008: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
 1009: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
 1010: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
 1011: 
 1012: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
 1013: 				       [write],
 1014: 				       Encoding,
 1015: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
 1016: 
 1017: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
 1018: 				       [write,binary],
 1019: 				       Encoding,
 1020: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
 1021: 
 1022: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
 1023: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
 1024: 			       ok
 1025: 		       end,
 1026: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
 1027: 				       [write],
 1028: 				       Encoding,
 1029: 				       Fun3),
 1030: 
 1031: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
 1032: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
 1033: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
 1034: 		       end,
 1035: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
 1036: 				       [write],
 1037: 				       Encoding,
 1038: 				       Fun4),
 1039: 
 1040: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
 1041: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
 1042: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
 1043: 			       ok
 1044: 		       end,
 1045: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
 1046: 				       [write],
 1047: 				       Encoding,
 1048: 				       Fun5),
 1049: 
 1050: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
 1051: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
 1052: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
 1053: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
 1054: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
 1055: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
 1056: 
 1057: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
 1058: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
 1059: 
 1060: 		ok
 1061: 	end,
 1062:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
 1063: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
 1064: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
 1065:     ok.
 1066: 
 1067: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1068:     do(fun() ->
 1069: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
 1070:        end).
 1071: 
 1072: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1073:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
 1074:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
 1075:     ok = file:close(F),
 1076:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
 1077: 
 1078: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
 1079:     case Fun(F) of
 1080: 	eof ->
 1081: 	    [];
 1082: 	{error,Error} ->
 1083: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
 1084: 	    exit(Error);
 1085: 	Other ->
 1086: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
 1087:     end.
 1088: 
 1089: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
 1090:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
 1091:     do(fun() ->
 1092: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
 1093:        end).
 1094: 
 1095: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
 1096:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
 1097:     Writer(F),
 1098:     ok = file:close(F),
 1099:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
 1100:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
 1101:     Bin.
 1102: 
 1103: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1104:     atom_to_list(Atom);
 1105: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1106:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
 1107: 
 1108: 
 1109: random_unicode(0) ->
 1110:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
 1111:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
 1112:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
 1113:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
 1114:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
 1115:      case rand:uniform(20) of
 1116:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
 1117:          _ -> []
 1118:      end];
 1119: random_unicode(N) ->
 1120:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
 1121:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
 1122: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
 1123: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
 1124: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
 1125: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
 1126: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
 1127: 	end,
 1128:     if
 1129:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
 1130:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
 1131:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
 1132:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
 1133: 	    random_unicode(N);
 1134: 	true ->
 1135: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
 1136:     end.
 1137: 
 1138: 
 1139: %% Test variants with binary option.
 1140: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1141:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1142:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1143:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1144: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
 1145: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
 1146: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
 1147: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
 1148: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
 1149:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
 1150:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
 1151:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
 1152:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
 1153:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
 1154:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
 1155:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
 1156:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
 1157:     file:close(F),
 1158:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
 1159:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
 1160:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
 1161:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
 1162:     file:position(F2,0),
 1163:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
 1164:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
 1165:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
 1166:     file:close(F2),
 1167:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
 1168:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
 1169:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
 1170:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
 1171:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
 1172:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1173:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1174:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1175:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
 1176:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1177:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1178:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1179:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1180:     file:close(F3),
 1181: 
 1182:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
 1183:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1184: 	new ->
 1185: 	    rtnode:run(
 1186:               [{putline, "2."},
 1187:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1188:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1189:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1190:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1191:                {putline, "hej"},
 1192:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1193:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1194:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1195:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1196:                {putline, "hej"},
 1197:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1198:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1199:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1200:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1201:               ],[]);
 1202:         _ ->
 1203:             ok
 1204:     end,
 1205:     %% And one with oldshell
 1206:     rtnode:run(
 1207:       [{putline, "2."},
 1208:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1209:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1210:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1211:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1212:        {putline, "hej"},
 1213:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1214:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1215:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1216:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1217:        {putline, "hej"},
 1218:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1219:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1220:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1221:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1222:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1223:     ok.
 1224: 
 1225: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
 1226:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1227:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
 1228:     TestDataLine1Oct = "\\\\345( \b)*\\\\344( \b)*\\\\366",
 1229:     rtnode:run(
 1230:       [{putline,""},
 1231:        {putline, "2."},
 1232:        {expect, "2"},
 1233:        {putline, "io:getopts()."},
 1234:        {expect, ">"},
 1235:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
 1236:        {expect, "<"},
 1237:        %% get_line
 1238:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1239:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1240:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1241:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1242:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1243:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1244:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1245:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1246:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1247:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1248:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1249:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1250:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1251:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1252:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1253:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1254:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1255:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1256:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1257:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1258:        %% get_chars
 1259:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1260:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1261:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1262:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1263:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1264:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1265:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1266:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1267:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1268:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1269:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1270:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1271:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1272:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1273:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1274:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1275:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1276:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1277:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1278:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1279:        %% fread
 1280:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1281:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1282:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1283:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1284:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1285:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1286:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1287:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1288:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1289:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1290:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1291:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1292:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1293:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1294:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1295:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1296:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1297:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1298:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1299:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1300: 
 1301:       ],Me,"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1302:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1303:     O ! {self(),done},
 1304:     ok.
 1305:

 1377:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1378: 
 1379:       ],Me,"",["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
 1380:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
 1381:     O ! {self(),done},

 1384: 
 1385: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1386: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1387:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1388: 	noshell ->
 1389: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1390: 	_ ->
 1391: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1392:     end.
 1393: 
 1394: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1395: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1396:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1397: 	noshell ->
 1398: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1399: 	old ->
 1400: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1401: 	_ ->
 1402: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1403:     end.
 1404: 
 1405: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1406:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1407:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1408:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1409: 
 1410:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1411:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1412:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1413:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1414: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1415: 
 1416:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1417:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1418:     %% get_line
 1419:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1420:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1421:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1422:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1423:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1424:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1425:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1426:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1427:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1428:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1429:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1430: 
 1431:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1432:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1433:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1434:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1435:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1436:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1437: 
 1438:     %%get_chars
 1439:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1440:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1441:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1442:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1443:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1444:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1445:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1446:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1447:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1448:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1449: 
 1450:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1451:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1452:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1453:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1454:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1455:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1456:     %%fread
 1457:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1458:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1459:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1460:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1461:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1462:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1463:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1464:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1465:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1466:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1467:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1468:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1469:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1470:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1471:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1472:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1473: 
 1474: 
 1475:     receive
 1476: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1477: 	    ok
 1478:     after 5000 ->
 1479: 	    exit(timeout)
 1480:     end,
 1481:     ok.
 1482: 
 1483: logging_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1484: 
 1485:     AssertString = fun(Match) ->
 1486:                            fun F() ->
 1487:                                    ?MODULE ! {get, self()},
 1488:                                    receive
 1489:                                        {put_chars, _, M} ->
 1490:                                            case string:find(M, Match) of
 1491:                                                nomatch -> io:format("~p~n",[M]), F();
 1492:                                                _ -> ok
 1493:                                            end
 1494:                                    after 500 -> timeout end
 1495:                            end
 1496:                    end,
 1497:     
 1498:     AssertTimeout = fun() ->
 1499:                             ?MODULE ! {get, self()},
 1500:                             receive
 1501:                                 timeout -> ok;
 1502:                                 Msg -> {unexpected, Msg}
 1503:                              end
 1504:                     end,
 1505: 
 1506:     rtnode:run(
 1507:       [{putline,""},
 1508:        {putline, "2."},
 1509:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
 1510:        {eval, fun() ->
 1511:                       Device = spawn(
 1512:                                  fun F() ->
 1513:                                          receive
 1514:                                              {get, Parent} ->
 1515:                                                  receive {io_request, From, ReplyAs, M} ->
 1516:                                                          Parent ! M,
 1517:                                                          From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, ok}
 1518:                                                  after 500 ->
 1519:                                                          Parent ! timeout
 1520:                                                  end,
 1521:                                                  F()
 1522:                                          end
 1523:                                  end),
 1524:                       register(?MODULE, Device),
 1525:                       ok = logger:add_handler(default, logger_std_h, #{ filter_default => stop, config => #{ type => {device, Device} }}),
 1526:                       ok = io:setopts(user, [{log,output}])
 1527:               end},
 1528:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1529:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1530:        {eval, AssertTimeout},
 1531:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:add_handler_filter(default, stderr, {fun logger_filters:domain/2, {log, sub, [otp, kernel, io]}}) end},
 1532:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1533:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1534:        {eval, AssertString("abc\n")},
 1535: 
 1536:        %% Check that no input events are logged
 1537:        {putline, "io:setopts([{log, output}])."},
 1538:        {expect, "\r\nok"},
 1539:        {eval, AssertString("ok\n")},
 1540:        {eval, AssertTimeout},
 1541: 
 1542:        %% Check that input events work
 1543:        {putline, "io:setopts([{log, input}])."},
 1544:        {expect, "\r\nok"},
 1545:        {eval, AssertString("get_until")},
 1546:        {putline, "io:get_line(\"prompt: \")."},
 1547:        {expect, "prompt: "},
 1548:        {eval, AssertString("get_line")},
 1549:        {putline, "def"},
 1550:        {expect, "\\Q\"def\\n\"\\E"},
 1551: 
 1552:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:set_primary_config(level, info) end}
 1553:       ],[],"",
 1554:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1555:        "-oldshell",
 1556:        "-connect_all","false",
 1557:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1558:        "-kernel","logger","[{handler, default, undefined}]",
 1559:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1560:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false"]),
 1561:     ok.
 1562: 
 1563: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1564: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1565:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1566:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1567:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1568:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1569:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1570: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1571:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1572:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1573:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1574:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1575:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1576:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1577:     ok.
 1578: 
 1579: 
 1580: %%
 1581: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1582: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1583:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1584:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1585: 
 1586: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1587:     Enc;
 1588: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1589:     latin1;
 1590: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1591:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1592: 
 1593: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1594: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1595:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1596: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1597: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1598: 	    try
 1599: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1600: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1601: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1602: 			       _ ->
 1603: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1604: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1605: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1606: 				       _ ->
 1607: 					   throw(skip)
 1608: 				   end
 1609: 			   end,
 1610: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1611: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1612: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1613: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1614: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1615: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1616: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1617: 			ok;
 1618: 		    Other1 ->
 1619: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1620: 		end,
 1621: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1622: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1623: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1624: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1625: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1626: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1627: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1628: 			ok;
 1629: 		    Other2 ->
 1630: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1631: 		end
 1632: 	    catch
 1633: 		throw:skip ->
 1634: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1635: 	    end;
 1636: 	{_,_} ->
 1637: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1638:     end.
 1639: 
 1640: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1641:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1642:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1643:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1644:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1645:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1646:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1647:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1648:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1649:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1650:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1651:     ok.
 1652: 
 1653: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1654:     receive
 1655:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1656:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1657:         {Port, eof} ->
 1658:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1659:     end.
 1660: 
 1661: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1662:     try
 1663:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1664:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1665:         halt(0)
 1666:     catch
 1667:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1668:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1669:             halt(17)
 1670:     end.
 1671: 
 1672: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1673:     rtnode:run(
 1674:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1675:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1676:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1677:         ],[]),
 1678:         ok.
 1679: 
 1680: invalid_req(_Config) ->
 1681:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1682:     whereis(user) ! {io_request, self(), Ref, invalid},
 1683:     receive M -> ?assertMatch({io_reply,_Ref, {error,request}}, M) end.
 1684: %%
 1685: %% Test I/O-server
 1686: %%
 1687: 
 1688: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1689:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1690: 
 1691: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1692:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1693: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1694:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1695: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1696:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1697: 
 1698: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1699:     Pid ! Mess,
 1700:     receive
 1701: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1702: 	    Answer
 1703:     after 5000 ->
 1704: 	    exit(timeout)
 1705:     end.
 1706: 
 1707: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1708:     receive
 1709:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1710:             case request(Request,State) of
 1711:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1712:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1713:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1714:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1715:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1716:                     exit(Reply)
 1717:             end;
 1718:         %% Private message
 1719:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1720:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1721:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1722:         {From, getall} ->
 1723:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1724:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1725:         {From, quit} ->
 1726:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1727: 	    ok;
 1728:         _Unknown ->
 1729:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1730:     end.
 1731: 
 1732: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1733:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1734: 
 1735: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1736:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1737: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1738:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1739: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1740: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1741:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1742: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1743:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1744: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1745: 										State#state.q]}};
 1746: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1747:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1748:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1749: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1750: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1751: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1752:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1753: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1754:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1755: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1756:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1757: request(getopts, State) ->
 1758:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1759: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1760: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1761: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1762: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1763:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1764: 
 1765: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1766:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1767: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1768:     Error;
 1769: multi_request([], State) ->
 1770:     State.
 1771: 
 1772: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1773:     Atom;
 1774: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1775:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1776: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1777:     try
 1778: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1779: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1780: 	L
 1781:     catch
 1782: 	_:_ ->
 1783: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1784:     end;
 1785: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1786:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1787: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1788:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1789: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1790: 	    Bin;
 1791: 	_ ->
 1792: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1793:     end.
 1794: 
 1795: atom2list(A) ->
 1796:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1797: 
 1798: chomp([]) ->
 1799:     [];
 1800: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1801:     [];
 1802: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1803:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1804: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1805:     <<>>;
 1806: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1807:     <<>>;
 1808: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1809:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1810:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1811: chomp(Atom) ->
 1812:     Atom.
 1813: 
 1814: do(Fun) ->
 1815:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1816: 				    exit(Fun())
 1817: 			    end),
 1818:     Ref.
 1819: 
 1820: done(Ref) ->
 1821:     receive
 1822: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1823: 	    Result
 1824:     end.
